CodeBlockMethod.Name: ShowNextText
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local isNameEnable = false local isPortraitEnable = false
local message = self.npcTalkData:GetCell(self.count, "text")
if message == nil then self.uiTalkPanel.Enable = false self.Talk = true return else self.uiTalkPanel.Enable = true self.uiMessageEntity.TextComponent.Text = message end
local name = self.npcTalkData:GetCell(self.count, "name") local portrait = self.npcTalkData:GetCell(self.count, "portrait")
if name ~= "" then isNameEnable = true self.uiNameEntity.TextComponent.Text = name end
if portrait ~= "" then isPortraitEnable = true self.uiPortraitEntity.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = portrait end
self.uiNameEntity.Enable = isNameEnable self.uiPortraitEntity.Enable = isPortraitEnable
self.count = self.count + 1

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.count = 1 self.npcTalkData = _DataService:GetTable("NPCTalk") self.uiNameEntity = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SurvivorTalk/TalkPanelSur/NameSur") self.uiMessageEntity = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SurvivorTalk/TalkPanelSur/TextSur") self.uiTalkPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SurvivorTalk/TalkPanelSur") self.uiPortraitEntity = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SurvivorTalk/TalkPanelSur/PortraitSur") self.DiaryGo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DiaryFindStart") self.DiaryFindRule = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/FindDiaryRule")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ShowDiaryGo
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.Show == false then if self.DiaryGo.Enable == false and self.DiaryFindRule.Enable == false then self.DiaryGo.Enable = true self.DiaryFindRule.Enable = true wait(5) self.DiaryGo.Enable = false end self.Show = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if key == KeyboardKey.Q then self:ShowNextText() if self.Talk == true then self:ShowDiaryGo() end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.DiaryFindRule.Enable == true then self.DiaryFindRule.Enable = false end
